tombstone.colinLink: Manage this business in Corporate Online

comments.charactersExceeded: {n} character too long | {n} characters too long
comments.commentTooLong: Your comment is too long please reduce it to less than {n} characters

general.pendingNotifications: No notifications | You have {n} pending approval | You have {n} pending approvals
general.notificationSubLabel: {n} team member require approval to access this account | {n} team members require approval to access this account

filing.text: Select who caused the correction. If client, completing party information and certification will be required. If staff, completing party information and certification will not be required.

error.contact: If this issue persists, please contact us.
error.default: The Business Dashboard application is currently unavailable. Please try again later.

text.unableToDownload: We were unable to download your document(s).
text.contact: If this error persists, please contact us.

authorizeAffiliationsError.title: Error updating affiliation invitation.
authorizeAffiliationsError.text: An error happened while updating affiliation invitation.

loadAffiliationsError.title: Error fetching affiliation invitation.
loadAffiliationsError.text: An error happened while fetching affiliation invitation.

loadBusinessFetchError.contact: If this problem continues, please contact us for help.

text.accessRestricted: You don't have permission to access this business. Go to your Business Registry Dashboard to request access to this business.
text.invalidLink: The link you entered is invalid. To access this business, try searching for it on the Business Registry Dashboard.
text.pageNotFound: We cannot display this information right now. Please try refreshing the page.

text.unableToDelete: We were unable to delete your filing.
text.hasErrors: We were unable to delete your filing due to the following errors:

text.unableToCancel: We were unable to cancel your payment.
text.hasErrors: We were unable to cancel your payment due to the following errors:

sessionExpiredError.title: Session Expired
sessionExpiredError.text: It looks like you've been inactive for a while and your session has expired. Log in again to continue.

coa.p1: Address changes take effect at 12:01 am Pacific Time. No other filings can be performed until an Address Change has taken effect.
coa.p2: If you need to perform other filings today, file them prior to your Address Change filing.

confirmDeleteDraft.title: Delete Draft?
confirmDeleteDraft.text: Delete your DRAFT_TITLE? Any changes you've made will be lost.

confirmDeleteApplication.title: Delete FILING_NAME?
confirmDeleteApplication.text: Deleting this DRAFT_TITLE will remove this application and all information associated with this application.
confirmDeleteApplication.text2: You will be returned to the Business Registry page.

notGoodStanding.notGoodStanding1: This business cannot be dissolved at this time because it is not in good standing with the Business Registry. There may be several reasons why a business is not in good standing, but the most common reason is an overdue annual report.
notGoodStanding.notGoodStanding2: Please file any overdue annual reports in your To Do list and try your voluntary dissolution again, or contact BC Registries staff:
notGoodStanding.changeNotGoodStanding1: The complete company information for this business cannot be viewed or changed at this time because the business is not in good standing with the Business Registry. There may be several reasons why a business is not in good standing, but the most common reason is an overdue annual report.
notGoodStanding.changeNotGoodStanding2: Please file any overdue annual reports in your To Do list and try to view and change the company information again, or contact BC Registries staff:

affiliation.followingAccountsRequest: The following account is requesting authorization to manage Registries activities for
affiliation.onlyAuthorizeIfYouRecognize: Only authorize this account if you recognize it.
affiliation.allowToManage: Allowing AUTHORIZE_TO_ACCOUNT to manage all Registries activities for AUTHORIZE_FOR_BUSINESS will allow it to do the following (including but not limited to)
affiliation.changeRecordsOffice: Change the records office of the business
affiliation.authorizeOtherAccountsToManage: Authorize other accounts to manage this business

empty.text1: You don't have anything to do yet
empty.text2: Filings that require your attention will appear here

annualReport.title: File AR_YEAR Annual Report
annualReport.verify: Verify your Office Address and Current Directors before filing your Annual Report.
annualReport.subtitle: including Address and/or Director Change
annualReport.checkbox: All information about the Office Addresses and Current Directors is correct.

notInGoodStanding.text1: This business is not in good standing.
notInGoodStanding.text2: Before you can alter your business, it must be in good standing with the Business Registry. There may be several reasons why a business is not in good standing, but the most common reason is an overdue annual report.
notInGoodStanding.text3: To resolve this issue, you MUST contact BC Registries staff:

changeRequested.continuationIn: Please make the following updates to your continuation authorization document.

conversionDetails.text: BC Registries is missing information about this business.

correctionComment.text1: This filing is in review and has been saved as a draft.
correctionComment.text2: Normal processing times are 2 to 5 business days. Priority processing times are 1 to 2 business days.

paymentUnsuccessful.title: Payment Unsuccessful
paymentUnsuccessful.text1: This filing is pending payment. The payment appears to have been unsuccessful for some reason.
paymentUnsuccessful.text2: You may continue this filing by selecting "Retry Payment".

paymentPendingOnlineBanking.title: Online Banking Payment Pending
paymentPendingOnlineBanking.text: This DRAFT_TITLE is pending payment and/or processing at your bank.

list.item1: If you have not done so, {boldStart}log in to your online bank account{boldEnd} to pay the outstanding balance on your BC Registries and Online Services account.
list.item3: Enter this payment identifier as your account number:
list.item4: Once submitted through your bank, Online Banking payments can take {boldStart}2 to 5 days to be processed{boldEnd}.
list.item5: {boldStart}Changes based on this DRAFT_TITLE will not appear{boldEnd} and {boldStart}other products and services{boldEnd} for this business {boldStart}will not be available{boldEnd} until the payment for this DRAFT_TITLE is received by BC Registries and Online Services.
list.item6: You can {boldStart}use a credit card to pay{boldEnd} for this DRAFT_TITLE immediately by selecting "Change Payment Type".

paymentPending.title: Payment Incomplete
paymentPending.text1: This filing is pending payment. The payment may still be in progress or may have been interrupted for some reason.
paymentPending.text2: You may continue this filing by selecting "Resume Payment".

paymentPaid.title: Paid
paymentPaid.text1: This filing is paid but the filing is not yet complete. Please check again later.
paymentPaid.text2: If this error persists, please contact us.

filing.paperFilingBody: This filing is available on paper only. To request copies of paper documents, contact BC Registries staff
filing.yourFilingsWillAppearHere: Your completed filings and transactions will appear here

amalgamation.consentAmalgamateOutTo: This consent to amalgamate out to
amalgamation.expiredConsent: This consent is expired. Please resubmit the amalgamate out application for authorization to become a foreign corporation.
amalgamation.companyStruckFromRegister: The Company has been struck from the register and ceased to be an incorporated company under the Business Corporations Act. You are required to retain a copy of all the Amalgamation Out documents in your records books.

continuation.consentContinueOutTo: This consent to continue out to
continuation.expiredConsent: This consent is expired. Please resubmit the continue out application for authorization to become a foreign corporation.
continuation.youWillReceiveRefundWithin10BusinessDays: You will receive a refund within 10 business days. Please submit a new application if you would like to continue your business into B.C.
continuation.companyStruckFromRegister: The Company has been struck from the register and ceased to be an incorporated company under the Business Corporations Act. You are required to retain a copy of all the Continuation Out documents in your records books.

dissolution.hasBeenStruckAndDissolved: has been struck from the register and dissolved
dissolution.requiredToRetain: You are required to retain a copy of all the dissolution documents in your records book.

restoration.wasSuccessfullyRestored: was successfully restored and is active
restoration.atTheEndOfLimitedRestorationPeriod: At the end of the limited restoration period, the company will be automatically dissolved. If you require assistance to extend a limited restoration/reinstatement or wish to convert your restoration from a limited period to a full restoration, please contact BC Registries staff
restoration.periodWasSuccessfullyExtended: The period of restoration was successfully extended and is active
restoration.atTheEndOfExtensionLimitedRestorationPer: At the end of the extended limited restoration period, the company will be automatically dissolved. If you require assistance to extend a limited restoration/reinstatement or wish to convert your restoration from a limited period to a full restoration, please contact BC Registries staff

courtOrder.hasCourtOrders: Court order(s) have been filed on this company. Review the filing history for impacts to business information.

general.paidButNotCompletedByRegistry: This FILING is paid, but the filing has not been completed by the Business Registry yet. Some filings may take longer than expected.
general.refreshScreenOrContact: Refresh this screen in a few minutes or you can come back later to check on the progress. If this issue persists, please contact us.

common.isRejectedForReasons: is rejected for the following reasons
common.pursuantToAPlanOfArrangement: Pursuant to a Plan of Arrangement
common.systemCompletedProcessingFiling: The system has completed processing your filing. You can now retrieve the business information.

freeze.message2: This filing will not appear in Filing History.

todoItem.affiliationRequest: Request for authorization to manage this business

notGoodStanding.notInGoodStanding: Business is not in good standing

menuAction.digitalCredentials: Manage the digital cards generated for the business.
menuAction.dissolveBusiness: Dissolving the business will make this business historical and it will be struck from the corporate registry.
menuAction.consentToAmalgamateOut: Submit a Consent to Amalgamate Out of the province of B.C.
menuAction.consentToContinueOut: Submit a Consent to Continue Out of the province of B.C.
menuAction.requirementsForRequestAgmExtension: The business must be in good standing to request an AGM extension.
menuAction.requestAgmExtension: Request an AGM extension. The longest extension granted at one time is six months.
menuAction.requirementsForRequestAgmLocationChange: The business must be in good standing to request an AGM location change.
menuAction.isNotFrozenForAmalgamate: This business is frozen and cannot be involved in an amalgamation.
menuAction.requirementsForAmalgamation: This business has a future effective dissolution and cannot be involved in an amalgamation.

button.businessSummary: View and download a summary of information about the business.
button.businessSummaryDisabled: Business Summaries are coming soon. Access them via BC OnLine or email bcregistries{'@'}gov.bc.ca for request information.
button.colinLink: BC Limited Companies are managed in Corporate Online.
button.isPendingDissolution: You cannot view or change business information while the business is pending dissolution.

tooltip.pendingAddressChange: The updated office addresses will be legally effective on COA_EFFECTIVE_DATE. No other filings are allowed until then.

headers.standing: This business is not in good standing
headers.dissolution: Urgent - this business is in the process of being dissolved
headers.compliance: This business is not in compliance
headers.nonentity: This corporation is not an entity
headers.amalgamation: This corporation is part of an amalgamation and is scheduled to become historical on {date}

descriptions.frozen: This business is frozen and therefore no filings can be completed at this time.
descriptions.standing: The most common reason a business is not in good standing is an overdue annual report. Any outstanding annual reports must filed to bring the business back into good standing.
descriptions.dissolution: This means that the business will be struck from the Corporate Registry in [date] due to overdue annual reports. Please file the annual reports immediately to bring this business back into good standing or request a delay of dissolution if more time is needed.
descriptions.missinginfo: BC Registries is missing information about your business (e.g., business start date, nature of business, business address, etc.). Please contact BC Registries to input any missing business information. Missing information must be entered before you can file changes or dissolve this business.
descriptions.nonentity: This corporation is not an entity

alerts.contact: For assistance, please contact BC Registries staff
alerts.contact2: If you have any questions, please contact BC Registries staff
alerts.contact3: To resolve this issue, you MUST contact BC Registries staff
alerts.contact4: If further action is required, please contact BC Registries staff
